pr_title: Move test fips configuration to script plugin

timeline.message:
Move test fips configurationt to script plugin

This commit moves the configuration of all test jvms for fips to a
script plugin. Fips testing is something very specific to the
Elasticsearch build and does not need to be passed on to plugin authors.

timeline.bodyText: We should use BuildParams.inFipsJvm here instead.
timeline.author: mark-vieira
timeline.diffHunk:
